forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 52, with temperatures falling to around 50 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 47. West northwest wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, the air carries a gentle warmth under a mostly sunny sky, though the chill whisper of the afternoon breeze hints at the inevitable drop in temperature. While the sun beams its soft light, a low marine layer of cloud lingers in the distance, blurring the lines of the iconic Golden Gate Bridge, which stands resolute against the horizon. As the day wears on, the nostalgic embrace of twilight will bring a blanket of clouds that settle cozily over the city, with evening temperatures gently folding down into the 40s.

As the light dims, the urban landscape may take on a quieter posture, inviting you to pull a light jacket over your shoulders, perhaps accompanied by a scarf to ward off the cooling breeze. This inviting afternoon is perfect for a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero, the waterfront alive with the chatter of passersby indulging in the beauty of a clear day before the clouds fully cloak the skyline. Alternatively, settling into a favorite café with a warm drink as dusk descends could be equally delightful, offering a moment of respite while watching the tranquil transformation of the cityscape.
